name: Web Push JB Custom Activity
description: Create a Web Push Journey Builder Custom Activity.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Name of the Heroku application above (either Heroku default or your custom name).

APP_CENTER_KEY.description: Application extension key - this must match exactly what is entered into the Journey Builder creation screen in MC App Center.

ACTIVITY_NAME.description: Name of the Custom Activity in Journey Builder.

ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION.description: Description of the Custom Activity purpose or usage.
ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION.value: This Activity will send a web browser push notification.

GCM_SERVER_KEY.description: Google Cloud Messaging Server Key.  Can be found https://console.firebase.google.com in YourProject->Settings->CLOUD MESSAGING

YOUR_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: Your email address.  Used by the message encryption engine

PUSH_REGISTRATION_DE_NAME.description: DE Name of Marketing Cloud Data Extension used to store web push registrations
